February IS, 1939
Mr. Irvin Stewart
41 East 42nd Street
New York, New York
bear Mr. Stewart:
Perhaps your committee has a owe under¬
stand in^ regarding the Joining of such organi¬
zations as the National Association of Educa¬
tional Broadcasters. However, X can see no
reason from our angle why your committee could
not become an aa ociate member of NAEB.
Within a few days, X shall senu you a
copy of our constitution. In the meantime,
X shall send you copies of the NAEB "lews
Letters" from the first of this year on.
Somehow, I am sure, we can arrange to send
you copies in the future.
Cordially yours,
fes/rc
Frank E. Schooley
